title: internal/app/app.go
subtitle: Application Core - Orchestration Layer
description:
Note: The App struct serves as the orchestration layer, coordinating all major components: worker pool, signal handling, and shutdown management. The New() constructor is called from main(), but execution truly begins with Run() which contains the main orchestration loop.

Component Composition

  • • Worker: Task execution engine
  • • Shutdown Manager: Graceful termination
  • • Signal Handler: OS signal processing
  • • WaitGroup: Goroutine synchronization

Key Methods

  • • New(): Constructor with DI (called from main.go)
  • • Run(): Main orchestration loop (entry point)
  • • cleanup(): Resource cleanup hook

Execution Flow: main.go → New() [builder] → Run() [orchestration entry] → Signal/Worker Setup → Wait for Shutdown → Cleanup → Exit
author: A.M.Hamidipour
